title: Shanti Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Portuguese
description: Food and coffee cafe, opened Jun 2013  inside Shopping Avenida. Menu is inspired by different world regions. Uses fresh and biological products. Offers 2 set menus plus snack foods. Simple space with free Wi-Fi. Also sells vegan pet food. Jul 2015 per owner food is all vegan.
streetAddress: Centro Comercial Avenida, Avenida Sa da Bandeira 2 piso
